title: Proxy Module
extract: Open proxy servers are dangerous both to your network and to the Internet at large. This module implements a proxy/gateway for Apache. ... Apache's proxy features are divided into several modules in addition to mod_proxy : mod_proxy_http , mod_proxy_ftp , mod_proxy_ajp , mod_proxy_balancer , and mod_proxy_connect .
extract_html: Open proxy servers are dangerous both to your network and to the Internet at large. This module implements a proxy/gateway for Apache. ... Apache's proxy features are divided into several modules in addition to mod_proxy : mod_proxy_http , mod_proxy_ftp , mod_proxy_ajp , mod_proxy_balancer , and mod_proxy_connect .
